text: "Beer for My Horses" is a 2003 song by singers Toby Keith and Willie Nelson. It was taken from Keith's seventh studio album Unleashed. It went to number 22 in the United States and topped the country singles chart. It was adapted into a movie in 2008. ==Notes== Category:2003 songs Category:Country songs Category:Toby Keith songs Category:Willie Nelson songs
title: Beer for My Horses
